description: A documented guideline addressing the issues where virtual machines fail to start after installing updates. This solution references reports indicating that the RCT issue has been resolved in the November update, which impacts virtual machines in the Azure Stack environment. The guidance likely includes troubleshooting steps and best practices for managing virtual machines affected by this update. While specific command-line tools or scripts are not provided, the resources linked serve as references for resolving the underlying issue. (LLM Synthesized)
